Rainy_Day_0: Please kjaere, stay safe out there today!$2#$b#Or you could stay in here, with me.$4
Rainy_Day_1: If you're poking your nose into those godsforsaken mines, please try not to die, kjaere. I'd miss you too much.$4#$b#Here this might help. Love you.[286 287 205 732]
Rainy_Day_2: I don't suppose I could convince you to stay in with me today?#$b#It's more fun to lie in bed and listen to the rain on the roof with company.$4
patio_Eyvinder: Not a bad farm, overall, though it needs a few more goats.
Rainy_Night_0: Ah good, min kjaerlighet! I've been imagining your homecoming all day.$1#$b#Figured first I'd start by helping you with those wet clothes. What do you say?$4
Rainy_Night_1: You're dripping wet. Still, your scent is pleasant - and not at all like wet goat.$1
Rainy_Night_2: Careful where you drip that mud, min kjaereste! I've just been mopping in here.#$b#Yeh, I may have lived in a cave, but that doesn't mean I'm uncivilized.$1
Rainy_Night_3: I've been watching daytime television; human entertainment is utter nonsense.#$b#Of course, I'll be switching it on tomorrow. I need to find out if Penelope gets revenge on that louse, Tom.$1
Rainy_Night_4: Come to bed, kjaere, and I'll read you a story.#$b#It's a terrifying tale of how a larvae with an unsatiable appetite devors all in its path before transforming into a flying monstrosity. It has pictures.$1#$e#Yes, it's called 'The Very Hungry Caterpillar'. I believe it's for children.
Indoor_Night_0: My legs are stiff from today's vigil. Hah, maybe age is finally catching up with me.$1
Indoor_Night_1: Tonight feels like a good night to drink mead beneath the stars.$1#$b#Hah, every night feels like a good night for that! Shall we, min kjaerlighet?$l
Indoor_Night_2: Did I miss you today? Oh, maybe just a little bit.#$b#Oh, come here and I'll show you how much, min kjaerlighet.$4
Indoor_Night_3: Good evening my Beauty. I've been imagining what Beast-ly things I might do to you.$4#$b#If you would care to join me.
Indoor_Night_4: It's been a long and tedious day without you, min kjaelighet. Wish for me to help you relax?$4
funLeave_Eyvinder: Ah, time for some fresh air. I've been cooped up here too long.#$b#Can't have farm life making me lazy.
funReturn_Eyvinder: Here, I caught this and figured you might have a use for it.
Neutral_0: Oh hey, it's you. Have a productive day. Me? I'll be in here, hardly missing you at all.$1
summer_15: It's been over three decades... but the memories never let go, .$2#$b#Dust... smoke... and the screaming... Those were dark times, min kjaerlighet.$2
